seo: 网课交单平台,SQL注入漏洞,epay.php
seo_en: Online Course Submission Platform,SQL Injection Vulnerability,epay.php
summary: 检测网课交单平台epay.php是否存在SQL注入漏洞，通过发送特定的HTTP请求并测量响应时间来判断漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: Detect whether there is an SQL injection vulnerability in the epay.php of the online course submission platform. Determine the existence of the vulnerability by sending a specific HTTP request and measuring the response time.
